m_szDocTitle: Video: New Customizable Consumer Car to Be Made Through Additive Manufacturing     :           Modern Machine Shop
m_szDocSumamry: Posted by: Peter Zelinski 9. July 2015 Video: New Customizable Consumer Car to Be Made Through Additive Manufacturing Local Motors released this video in conjunction with its announcement this week that it expects to have an electric car for sale to consumers next year, which will be made on-demand through additive manufacturing using the large-scale 3D printing system that has already been proven on previous 3D printed cars . Just one of the virtues of an additive approach to production is customizability within short lead times, and Local Motors says buyers of this new car will be able to cu
